description: Simple and efficient compass MBCompass is a simple, reliable compass app with a sleek design and accurate navigation. Works offline, saves battery, and is perfect for outdoor adventures or everyday use. Key Features: - Accurate Navigation: Get precise cardinal directional with degrees. - Minimalist Design: Enjoy a clean, distraction-free interface that's easy to use. - Works Offline: No external dependencies, Uses device sensors. - Sensor fusion: Combines (Accelerometer and Magnetometer) for better accuracy. - Power efficient: Designed to be efficient and lightweight.
